paper_abstract: The PCI express adaptive communication hub (peach) is an eight- core communication system on chip with four PCI express revision 2.0 ports, each with four lanes. Peach realizes a high- performance, power- aware, highly dependable network that uses PCI express not only for connecting peripheral devices but also as a communication link between computing nodes. This approach opens up new possibilities for a range of communications.
paper_title: PEACH: A MULTICORE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM ON CHIP WITH PCI EXPRESS
